venue.name: Microsoft NERD New England Research & Development Center

item.description:
Show 'n Tell & Code As Well

Now that the refs are back, Boston PHP would like to celebrate with an evening of coding fun without replacement refs.  Bring your laptop and bring a project you are working on.  We'll provide the concessions.

Show 'n Tell
If you would like to show your project to a small group of people and garner fan support or coding help, simply call a time out, grab your laptop and migrate to a breakout room or the lounge area for a team huddle and instant reply.

Code as Well
If, on the other hand, you would like to work on a personal project, by yourself or with the help of potential coaches and teammates, then simply stay in the glass-enclosed playing field and code until you cross the goal line.

Players of all abilities are welcome.  Rookies, veterans and superstars.  The only ones not invited are the replacement refs!

There will be no official presentation at this event. This meetup will be what you make it.

Special thanks to Co-Organizer Gene Babon for writing this meeup description.

Please note, that due to scheduling constraints at NERD, this event is on a THURSDAY night, not our usual Wednesday.


 Agenda:

6PM - (Free) Pizza arrives

6-9PM Ideas fly, connections are made, knowledge is shared, learning abounds

9PM Beers at Champions Bar??
item.how_to_find_us: This will be on the first floor in the Horace Mann Room
item.name: Show 'n Tell & Code as Well
